svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/26.2.15 Chrome/134.0.6998.205 Electron/35.2.1 Safari/537.36" version="26.2.15"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="w6PyydAIjaUy8KaljkZe"> <mxGraphModel dx="1909" dy="731" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39" value="战斗状态" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;startSize=25;container=0;collapsible=0;rounded=1;arcSize=14;dropTarget=0;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="600" width="870" height="544" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-40" value="" style="ellipse;fillColor=strokeColor;" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="278.13" width="28" height="28" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-41" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39"> <mxGeometry x="188" y="1262" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-42" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39"> <mxGeometry x="258" y="1377" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-43" value="第一阶段" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;startSize=25;container=0;collapsible=0;rounded=1;arcSize=14;dropTarget=0;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="80" width="173" height="430" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-108" value="" style="group" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-43"> <mxGeometry x="33" y="40" width="97" height="356" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-44" value="" style="ellipse;fillColor=strokeColor;" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-108"> <mxGeometry x="42" width="14" height="14" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-45" value="召唤仆从" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-108"> <mxGeometry x="9" y="154" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-46" value="静止施法" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-108"> <mxGeometry x="9" y="316" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-47" value="召唤幽影翼、潜影贝、仆从" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;exitX=0.46;exitY=1;entryX=0.49;entryY=0;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-108" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-44" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-45"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-48" value="[持续10秒]" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;exitX=0.35;exitY=1;entryX=0.35;entryY=0.01;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-108" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-45" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-46"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint y="255" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-49" value="[冷却15秒]" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;exitX=0.64;exitY=0.01;entryX=0.64;entryY=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-108" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-46" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-45"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="97" y="255" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-50" value="第二阶段" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;startSize=25;container=0;collapsible=0;rounded=1;arcSize=14;dropTarget=0;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39"> <mxGeometry x="484.5" y="78.13" width="290" height="435.75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-58" value="血量 >50%" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-40" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-43"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-59" value="血量 ≤50%
激活黑洞技能" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-43" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-50"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-110" value="" style="group" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="120" width="199" height="374" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-51" value="" style="ellipse;fillColor=strokeColor;" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-110"> <mxGeometry x="93" width="14" height="14" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-52" value="黑洞吸附" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-110"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="154" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-53" value="持续伤害" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-110"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="334" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-54" value="生成8格半径黑洞
吸附实体" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;exitX=0.48;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-110" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-51" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-52"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-55" value="2秒后释放龙息伤害" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;exitX=0.22;exitY=1;entryX=0.22;entryY=0;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-110" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-52" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-53"> <mxGeometry x="-0.3098" y="24" relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint y="264" /> </Array> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-56" value="[冷却15秒]
若有生物死亡则回血" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;exitX=0.77;exitY=0;entryX=0.77;entryY=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-110" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-53" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-52"> <mxGeometry x="0.2318" y="16" relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="199" y="264" /> </Array> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-62" value="死亡状态" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1050" y="852" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-63" value="" style="ellipse;shape=endState;fillColor=strokeColor;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1215" y="859" width="26" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-65" value="通用特性：<br> - 免疫弓箭，概率闪避瞬移<br> - BOSS 房不可破坏" style="align=left;spacingLeft=4;shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;fontColor=#000000;darkOpacity=0.05;fillColor=#FFF9B2;strokeColor=none;fillStyle=solid;direction=west;gradientDirection=north;gradientColor=#FFF2A1;shadow=1;size=20;pointerEvents=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-295" y="920" width="230" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-66" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="940" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-67" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="686" y="1834" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-72" value="" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-62" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-63"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> <mxPoint x="1370" y="950" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-116" value="生成掉落物<div>清除实体</div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-72"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0521" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-73" value="玩家进入战斗范围" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;rounded=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-38" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0643" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="30" y="850" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-74" value="血量 ≤0
生成大范围黑洞爆炸" style="startArrow=none;;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;rounded=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-39" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-62"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1260" y="900" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-75" value="" style="dashed=1;startArrow=none;;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-65"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="30" y="995" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-114" value="" style="group" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-414" y="852" width="273" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-37" value="" style="ellipse;fillColor=strokeColor;" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-114"> <mxGeometry y="8" width="24" height="24" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-38" value="待机状态" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-114"> <mxGeometry x="193" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-68" value="生成于末地核心底层" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-114" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-37" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-38"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-78" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;curved=1;" edge="1" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-114" source="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-38" target="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-38"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-117" value="快速恢复血量" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="a87_oJeUW2Dp3tyCe-G1-78"> <mxGeometry x="-0.2589" y="3" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

g.text: 召唤幽影翼、潜影贝、仆从

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 224px; height: 1px; padding-top: 395px; margin-left: 125px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
通用特性：
- 免疫弓箭，概率闪避瞬移
- BOSS 房不可破坏

switch.text: 通用特性： - 免疫弓箭，概率闪避瞬移...

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 274px; margin-left: 1585px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

生成掉落物
清除实体

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
